ref: 1253 *āmārta ʻ flour from uncleaned grain ʼ. [Cf. āma -- n. ʻ grain not yet freed from chaff ʼ MW, Pa. āmadhañña<-> n., Pk. āma -- ʻ uncleaned ʼ; and Wakhi yūmǰ ʻ flour < *āmačī, Khot. hāmaa -- ʻ barley -- flour ʼ < *āmaka<-> Morgenstierne IIFL ii 554: -- āmá -- , *ārta -- 2]
Mth. ã̄waṭ ʻ barley ground without being first cleaned ʼ.
